template1.title: Order status change notification to Event Buyer

emailfields0.subject: Your order status changed for event {{subject.title}} on site
emailfields0.body:
Hi,
Your ticket on site {{event.site}} for {{event.title}} status has been {{order.newStatus}}.

smsfields0.body: Your order status has been changed into {{order.newStatus}} for {{event.title}}.

webfields0.subject: Your order status changed for event {{subject.title}} on site
webfields0.body: Your order status has been changed into {{order.newStatus}} for {{event.title}}.

template2.title: Offline Event ticket notification to Event Buyer

emailfields0.subject: {{subject.site}} ETicket For {{subject.title}}.
emailfields0.body:
Hi
Welcome to {{ticket.title}}

{{ticket.ticket_type_desc}}		 Booking ID: {{{ticket.ticket_id}} {{buyer.last_name}}

Name: {{buyer.first_name}} {{buyer.last_name}}

Ticket Type: {{ticket.ticket_type_title}} .

Event Start Date
{{ticket.startdate}}
Event END Date
{{ticket.enddate}}
Event Location
{{ticket.location}}
**Note:- Show this email at the time of event

smsfields0.body: Check your ticket details for {{event.title}} here {{ticket.ticketLink}}

webfields0.subject: {{subject.site}} ETicket For {{subject.title}}.
webfields0.body: Check your ticket details for {{event.title}} here {{ticket.ticketLink}}

replacement_tags.name: customFields.field-name
replacement_tags.description: To showing custom fields data in email use given tag formate.For. e.g custom field label 'Participant name', the tag will be the 'customFields.participant-name'

replacement_tags.name: customFields.field-name-subfield-name
replacement_tags.description: To show Joomla repeatable custom fields of event data in email use given tag format. For. e.g custom field label 'Participant name' and its sub field 'Mobile Number', the tag will be 'customFields.participant-name-mobile-number'. Note - Blank space should be replace with '-'.

replacement_tags.name: ticket.barcode_url
replacement_tags.description: Add this tag for Barcode. Do not use image HTML tag to add it.

template3.title: Payment invoice notification to Event Buyer

emailfields0.subject: Ticket booking order status for event '{{subject.title}}'
emailfields0.body:
{{event.title}}

 
 
Order Id {{order.orderid_with_prefix}}
Payment Status {{order.newStatus}}
Order Date {{order.cdate}}
{{order.firstname}} {{order.lastname}}
{{order.phone}}
{{order.user_email}}
{{order.address}} {{order.city}}
{{order.zipcode}}, {{order.state}}, {{order.country}}

Payment Information:

Ticket Information:

{{ticket.TICKET_INFO}}
 
 Sub Total{{order.subTotal}}
 Fee{{order.platform_fee}}
 Total Amount With Fee{{order.amountwithFee}}
 Discount of coupon ({{order.coupon}}) {{order.discount}}
 Tax Amount {{order.taxPercent}} {{order.taxAmount}}
 Order Total{{order.total}}

smsfields0.body: Your order status is {{order.newStatus}} for {{event.title}}. Please check {{order.url}} for invoice details.

webfields0.subject: Ticket booking order status for event '{{subject.title}}'
webfields0.body: Your order status is {{order.newStatus}} for {{event.title}}. Please check {{order.url}} for invoice details.

replacement_tags.name: ticket.TICKET_INFO
replacement_tags.description: TICKET_INFO contain all ticket type information. TICKET_INFO is a language constant which have two langauge constant TICKET_HEAD and TICKET_TYPES. You can accordingly change your HTML from langauge file. This tag can only be used in email template

template4.title: Online event ticket notification to Event Buyer

emailfields0.subject: {{subject.site}} ETicket For {{subject.title}}.
emailfields0.body:
Hello {{user.name}},

Your ticket for {{event.title}}

Time:{{event.startdate}} - {{event.enddate}}

Meeting Url: Link - On event time you can click on this link to join the event or you can log in to the site and click on 'Enter Meeting' button to join the event.

smsfields0.body: To join {{event.title}} on {{event.startdate}}, use this link {{user.url}}.

webfields0.subject: {{subject.site}} ETicket For {{subject.title}}.
webfields0.body: To join {{event.title}} on {{event.startdate}}, use this link {{user.url}}.

emailfields0.subject: You have checked into {{subject.title}}.
emailfields0.body:
Hi {{checkin.attendee_name}},

The ticket you booked has checked into {{event.title}}.

Thanks!

smsfields0.body: You have successfully checked into {{event.title}}. Thank you for your presence.

webfields0.subject: You have checked into {{subject.title}}.
webfields0.body: You have successfully checked into {{event.title}}. Thank you for your presence.

replacement_tags.name: checkin.certificateUrl
replacement_tags.description: Event certificate.This tag can only be used in email template.

replacement_tags.name: checkin.certificateRawUrl
replacement_tags.description: Event certificate.This tag can only be used in email template.

template6.title: Waiting List Classroom Training Auto-advance Notification

emailfields0.subject: You have been added to the waiting list for {{subject.title}}.
emailfields0.body:
Hi {{user.name}},

Thank you for your interest in {{event.title}}. Since all seats are booked right now, you have been enrolled to the waiting list for the event. In case we get any cancellations or event capacity increases, we shall automatically enroll you in the event and notify you about the same.

Thank you!

{{event.site}}

smsfields0.body: Thank you for your interest in {{event.title}}. We have added you to the waiting list. we will automatically enroll you incase change in availability.

webfields0.subject: You have been added to the waiting list for {{subject.title}}.
webfields0.body: Thank you for your interest in {{event.title}}. We have added you to the waiting list. we will automatically enroll you incase change in availability.

emailfields0.subject: You have been added to the waiting list for {{subject.title}}.
emailfields0.body:
Hi {{user.name}},

Thank you for your interest in {{event.title}}. We have added you to the waiting list since seats are exhausted. We shall notify you when seats are available for booking for this event

Thank you!

{{event.site}}

smsfields0.body: Thank you for your interest in {{event.title}}. We have added you to the waiting list. We will notify you when seats are available for booking.

webfields0.subject: You have been added to the waiting list for {{subject.title}}.
webfields0.body: Thank you for your interest in {{event.title}}. We have added you to the waiting list. We will notify you when seats are available for booking.

template8.title: Tickets are available notification for waitlisted users

emailfields0.subject: Tickets are now available for the event {{subject.title}}
emailfields0.body:
Hi {{user.name}},

Thank you for your interest in {{event.title}} .

We have increased seat availability. Now you can buy the ticket.

Thank you!

{{event.site}}

smsfields0.body: Tickets are now available for the {{event.title}}. Now you can buy a ticket.

webfields0.subject: Tickets are now available for the event {{subject.title}}
webfields0.body: Tickets are now available for the {{event.title}}. Now you can buy a ticket.

template10.title: Enrolment Rejection notification to Event Buyer

emailfields0.subject: Enrollment-{{subject.enrollmentId}} rejected for {{subject.title}}.
emailfields0.body:
Hi {{buyer.first_name}}, 

 

Your enrollment-{{buyer.enrollmentId}} has been rejected for {{event.title}}. If you have any queries regarding the same then please contact {{buyer.site}} administrator.

 

Thank you.

template32.title: Offline Event ticket notification to Event Buyer for All E-tickets in one email

emailfields0.subject: {{subject.site}} E-Tickets of all attendees for Event {{subject.title}}.
emailfields0.body:
Hello {{buyer.eventBuyer}},

You have bought {{buyer.ticketCount}} tickets for event {{ticket.title}}. Please find attached e-tickets for all the attendees.

smsfields0.body: You have bought {{buyer.ticketCount}} tickets for event {{ticket.title}}. Please find e-tickets on your mail.

webfields0.subject: {{subject.site}} E-Tickets of all attendees for Event {{subject.title}}.
webfields0.body: You have bought {{buyer.ticketCount}} tickets for event {{ticket.title}}. Please find e-tickets on your mail.

emailfields0.subject: An Unmissable Opportunity Awaits You
emailfields0.body:
Dear Attendee,

We are excited to inform you about an upcoming event, {{event.eventTitle}}, that aligns with your interests.

As someone who has attended similar events, we believe this will be a valuable opportunity for you to connect, learn, and engage with like-minded professionals.

Stay tuned for more details, and we look forward to your participation.

Best Regards,
JTicketing Team

smsfields0.body: Hey! A new event {{event.eventTitle}} is happening. Check it out: {{event.link}}

webfields0.subject: New Event Alert: {{subject.eventTitle}}
webfields0.body: You attended a similar event before. Check out the new event: {{event.eventTitle}}

emailfields0.subject: We’d love to hear your thoughts about the event.
emailfields0.body:
Dear Attendee,

Thank you for attending {{event.eventTitle}}. We trust that you found the event valuable and enjoyable.

To ensure we continue to provide high-quality experiences, we would be grateful if you could take a few moments to share your feedback. Your input is invaluable to us in enhancing our future events.

Provide Feedback

We appreciate your time and input. Thank you.

Best regards,
The JTicketing Team

smsfields0.body: Thanks for attending {{event.eventTitle}}! We'd love your feedback: {{event.feedbackLink}}

webfields0.subject: How was {{event.eventTitle}}?
webfields0.body: We appreciate your participation in {{event.eventTitle}}. Please click here to tell us what you think!
